name: SubwaySounds
0:
”Alexa open subway sounds”
”Alexa ask subway sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: subway sounds
des: Embark on an aural journey with the ultimate Subway Sounds. Transport yourself to the bustling undergrounds of the world's most famous cities. Perfect for city lovers, ex-pats, or those in search of a cosmopolitan soundscape for focus or relaxation. Our authentic, high-quality audio captures the essence of subway travel, from the beep of a passing turnstile to the murmur of commuter conversations. Enhance your meditation, spark your creativity, or simply unwind as you ride the sonic waves of the urban underground.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
